job_description: As a Machine learning engineer, you will develop algorithms that enhance the daily life and professional outcomes of our end-users. You will join a team of other ML engineers / data scientists, big data, and software engineers, all responsible for the delivery of algorithms through the Orchestrated Analytics Platform from the ground up. You will work with product and business stakeholders to deliver algorithms with very clear business objectives, including requirements gathering, model development, prototyping, and interfacing with the software engineering team. Ideal candidates will bring a well-rounded skillset capable of spanning customer-focus, data science and software development disciplines to shape early-stage ideas into fully assessed, designed, and implemented machine learning solutions.
responsibilities: Work closely with non-technical stakeholders to successfully execute ML models and algorithms in the platform.
Analyze large datasets
Interface with software engineering & Algorithm SME team for the development of the product.
Design and develop proof-of-concept solutions as needed using ML Products.
Mentor and coach junior team members. Educate leadership team to bring up to speed with technical advances.
Build, Own and Support production grade, scalable algorithms in the Next Best ML Platform.
qualification: Master's degree in Data Science or related field
5+ years’ experience working on creating and deploying machine learning algorithms.
Creative problem solver with a strong knowledge of statistics/data analytics, and machine learning methods and strategies.
Experience with software engineering best practices (programming, testing, version control, agile development, etc.)
Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills

job_description: As a Scrum Master for multiple product development teams, you will facilitate the scrum processes by implementing agile best practices, promoting effective collaboration, and providing organizational leadership. You will help the global development teams perform at their highest level while maintaining adherence to the established Agile/Scrum methodologies, from concept to deployment. We are looking for someone who enjoys working in a highly collaborative organization that values quality and shared interaction. Your primary objectives are to support, motivate and coach our high-performing development teams as they deliver truly cutting-edge products for some of the largest healthcare industry clients in the country.
responsibilities: Promote and nurture team creativity and efficiency
Ensure each Scrum team member has the resources and information needed for success
Remove impediments for your team members and shield them from external interference
Execute the Scrum framework and supporting processes
Proactively coach team members on Scrum and agile best practices
Provide agile leadership and coaching for the development team and project stakeholders regarding process methodologies, scrum practices, collaboration tools, etc.
Organize, schedule, and facilitate agile ceremonies, including daily stand-up, sprint reviews, sprint retrospectives, backlog grooming, sprint planning, and other meetings as needed
Collaborate with Product Owners and other key stakeholders to identify, refine, and shape the product backlog and roadmap to support business value delivery
Consistently deliver established team reporting and guidance metrics
benefits: Flexible work hours or remote work options
Paid time off and vacation days
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Project Management or related field
Proven experience in managing IT projects
Strong leadership and team collaboration skills
Effective risk management and problem-solving abilities
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
